body:
Grasshope,

The Honeybee_IntersectMasses component is made to help you with this.  This video explains, in-depth, how you should use it:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDvBWDA0aF0&index=10&list=P...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDvBWDA0aF0&index=10&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_)

-Chris
